Useful notes on the BBBÂ¶

To simplify installations and git operation on the BB, an internet connection may be established when connecting the a Linux host computer (except for Fedora). Run the following two commands on the BB

  1. /sbin/route add default gw 192.168.7.1
  2. echo "nameserver 8.8.8.8" >> /etc/resolv.conf

and then execute the following two commands on the Linux host

  1. sudo iptables -A POSTROUTING -t nat -j MASQUERADE
  2. sudo echo 1 | sudo tee /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward > /dev/null

Now a connection should be established and, and this can be checked with a ping, such as ping www.shipyourenemiesglitter.com`.

A useful command for transferring files to and from the device is the secure copy command, which can be used in the following way

scp root@192.168.7.2:<some file on the BB> <some directory on the host>
